text: Luciano Caldas Bivar (born 29 November 1944) is a Brazilian politician and businessman. He was the PSL candidate for President of Brazil in the 2006 election. He has been the Federal Deputy for Pernambuco since 2019. He ran for president again in the 2022 election, before dropping out in July 2022. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian businesspeople Category:Politicians from Pernambuco
title: Luciano Bivar
